Class ForceField

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.computational.ForceField
public class ForceField extends Object
Molecular mechanics force field calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Constructor Details

    • ForceField

      public ForceField()

  • Method Details

    • lennardJones

      public static double lennardJones(double r, double epsilon, double sigma)
      Lennard-Jones 12-6 potential for van der Waals interactions. V(r) = ε * [(σ/r)^12 - 2*(σ/r)^6]
      Parameters:
      r - Distance between atoms
      epsilon - Well depth (energy at minimum)
      sigma - Distance at which V = 0
      Returns:
      Potential energy

    • lennardJonesForce

      public static double lennardJonesForce(double r, double epsilon, double sigma)
      Lennard-Jones force (negative derivative of potential). F(r) = 12ε/r * [(σ/r)^12 - (σ/r)^6]

    • bondStretch

      public static double bondStretch(double r, double r0, double k)
      Harmonic bond stretching potential. V(r) = 0.5 * k * (r - r0)²
      Parameters:
      r - Current bond length
      r0 - Equilibrium bond length
      k - Force constant
      Returns:
      Potential energy

    • angleBend

      public static double angleBend(double theta, double theta0, double k)
      Harmonic angle bending potential. V(θ) = 0.5 * k * (θ - θ0)²
      Parameters:
      theta - Current angle (radians)
      theta0 - Equilibrium angle (radians)
      k - Force constant
      Returns:
      Potential energy

    • torsion

      public static double torsion(double phi, double Vn, int n, double gamma)
      Torsional (dihedral) potential. V(φ) = V_n/2 * [1 + cos(n*φ - γ)]
      Parameters:
      phi - Dihedral angle (radians)
      Vn - Barrier height
      n - Periodicity
      gamma - Phase offset (radians)
      Returns:
      Potential energy

    • coulomb

      public static double coulomb(double q1, double q2, double r)
      Coulomb electrostatic interaction. V(r) = (q1 * q2) / (4πε0 * r)
      Parameters:
      q1 - Charge 1 (in elementary charges)
      q2 - Charge 2 (in elementary charges)
      r - Distance (Angstroms)
      Returns:
      Energy in kcal/mol (using dielectric constant = 1)

    • morse

      public static double morse(double r, double re, double De, double a)
      Morse potential for bond stretching (more accurate than harmonic). V(r) = D_e * [1 - exp(-a*(r-r_e))]²
      Parameters:
      r - Current bond length
      re - Equilibrium bond length
      De - Dissociation energy
      a - Width parameter = sqrt(k_e / 2*D_e)
      Returns:
      Potential energy

    • calculatePotentialEnergy

      public static double calculatePotentialEnergy(Molecule molecule)
      Calculates total potential energy of a molecule. Includes Bond stretching and Non-bonded interactions (LJ only for now).
      Parameters:
      molecule - The molecule
      Returns:
      Total potential energy in kcal/mol
